name: Of Bulls & Brambles
description:
A little bramble named Blotchkins wishes to research the health of the forgotten Bull King, will you help them?

This game is relatively short, and also rather crude, being my first ever crack at making a game of any sorts.

It was done for a school project, so yada yada themes yada yada content stuff, but fret not, you don't have to work in education to enjoy this game.

I reckon some of the environments and tunes are rather neat, so if you like those atmospheric vibes you might enjoy this.

So, sit back, immerse yourself in some janky rpg maker 2003 vibes, and enjoy.
